name: Who Killed Grandpa
description:
Can you figure out Who Killed Grandpa? 

This game creates procedurally generated murder mysteries.  Be a detective and try to figure out who killed grandpa by examining each suspect's testimony of the events leading up to the murder.  Is the character lying?  Can their claims be backed up by others who were in the room?

Can't remember who's who and where's where?  Use the family tree to keep track of the suspected family members and the house map to see what rooms connect together.  

Don't make too many wild guesses as to who the murderer is.  The public will lose trust in you and call you the boy who cried wolf the detective who cried murderer.

Get stuck?  Commune with Grandpa's ghost to get a hint of what the murderer looks like.  But, be careful, talking to ghosts will reduce the public's trust in you.

Controls:

  • Arrow keys / WASD to pan
  • Scroll wheel to zoom
  • Right click on a suspect to open an accusation menu
  • Right click on Grandpa to open up a hint menu
